Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class SynchronousMatch

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Match
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.SynchronousMatch
class SynchronousMatch extends Match
Mock class for the Match class that executes all commands in the same (main) thread.

  • Method Details

    • executeUserCommand

      public void executeUserCommand(UserCommand command, Dispatcher dispatcher) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from class: Match
      This method executes a match-related command. It takes a UserCommand and the Dispatcher that sent this command, creates a Tuple containing the two and adds it to Match.commands. The two parameters are assumed to be correct and non-null.
      Overrides:
      executeUserCommand in class Match
      Parameters:
      command - the UserCommand to be executed
      dispatcher - the requesting Dispatcher
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
